title: Room on the Broom
description: This board book edition of a classic is a great way to introduce Halloween to the youngest of readersÂ with a sweet-but-slightly-spooky story that makes it an ideal gift bookThis rollicking, rhyming tale from master storyteller Julia Donaldson is the perfect Halloween read-aloud for the youngest listeners. A friendly witch, hungry dragon, and muddy monster learn about friendship, and readers will delight in the surprising (and not too scary) ending.
author: Julia Donaldson
